title: Record of Agarest War Zero
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English.  A battle across generations, with the fate of an entire planet at stake! Return to the world of Agarest, and lead new heroes to victory in both the martial and marital arenas.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Additional Costume 1
childDownloads.description: Something new to dress one of the women up in during Free Intention! Why don't you go put it on someone now?

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Additional Costume 2
childDownloads.description: Something new to dress one of the women up in during Free Intention! Why don't you go put it on someone now?

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Believer of The God of Wind
childDownloads.description: I've prepared Zefalon, Rebellion, Legendary Paw, and Wind of Carillon for you. "With these items, I should easily be able to--" "That'd be cheating."

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Chaos War Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 1 Rage Blaster, 1 Vajra Rod, 1 Altis Rod, 1 99 Magnum, and 1 Epsilon Ring. "I feel like these are all relics from a war on a different world..."

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Cie's Bargain Pack
childDownloads.description: I've prepared Wienerwurst, Ice Cream, Deshimaru, Brother Stave, and on top of all that, HIROKO! "Hehehe! Am I generous or what! Plus, I have these exchange tickets for a roasted chicken--" "Bu-kawk!‚Äù "Ouch! I-I'm just kidding of course! Ow!" "Bukaaaaawk! "

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Daily Life Extension Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains Carrot Sword, Super Scallion, Lollipop Stick, Classic Kettle, Pot Lid, and Kaopectate. Y-Yes! A scallion is finally available as an item! "It hurrrrts..."

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Dream Oracle Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 2 Damascus, 2 Meteoric Iron, 2 Generation Crystal, 2 Lapis Noster, 1 Shiny Fang, and 1 Whispered Dream. "U-Um... I've collected all these things, just like my dream said..."

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Extra Dungeon 1
childDownloads.description: I can see it... With this, you will receive the additional dungeon "Fohites Ruins," which is playable during the first generation. In order to get there, you must proceed through the game to a certain point, and view a certain event. Brand-new adventures await you...

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Extra Dungeon 2
childDownloads.description: I can see it... With this, you will acquire the additional dungeon "Neige Snow Field," which is playable during the second generation. In order to get there, you must proceed through the game to a certain point, and view a certain event. Now your journey into the frontier begins...

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Face Gallery Open
childDownloads.description: This will unlock all of the character facial animations for viewing.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Fallen Angel Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains Black Frame, Black Bustier, Angel Halo, and Angel Wing. This might be the perfect package for people who were hoping to dress up as a fallen angel for Halloween this year.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Forbidden Book Volume 1
childDownloads.description: This will give you the 6th Forbidden Tome. To be reunited with the people it contains, you must proceed through the game to a certain point, and view a certain event.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Forbidden Book Volume 2
childDownloads.description: This will give you the 7th Forbidden Tome. To be reunited with the men it contains, you must proceed through the game to a certain point, and view a certain event.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Forbidden Book Volume 3
childDownloads.description: This will give you the 8th Forbidden Tome. To be reunited with the women it contains, you must proceed through the game to a certain point, and view a certain event.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Gallery Open
childDownloads.description: This will unlock all the gallery items for viewing.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Healing and Defense Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 2 Marfile Seed, 2 Vessel of Life, 1 Revive, 1 Dryad's Soul, and 1 Requiem Bracelet.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Healing Hand Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 3 Magic Herb, 2 Cure Grass, 2 Stone of Life, 1 Resurrect, 1 Moonlight Flower, and 1 Lucky Charm. Life is precious!

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Impregnable Defenses Pack 1
childDownloads.description: "Attacking isn't the only way to fight, you know?" I've prepared an Extra Frame, a Chaos Frame, Heaven's End, and E. O. M. for you.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Impregnable Defenses Pack 2
childDownloads.description: "Attacking isn't the only way to fight. Keep that in mind." I've put together a Dragon Frame, a Demon Frame, a Mighty Ring, a Dismal Sylph, and a Prometheus Bound for you.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Legendary Beast Pack
childDownloads.description: This contains Seiryu's Sword, Genbu's Gauntlet, Byakko's Bracelet, and Suzaku's Ring. "Saya, I think this is a great time for you to finally memorize all the directions." "Y-Yes, I suppose... H-Huh...?"

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Legendary Goods Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains 2 Divine Branch, 2 Unicorn Horn, 2 Moon Fragment, 2 Magic Crystal Chip, 1 Seed of Happiness, and 1 Bracelet of Feicui. "...This branch isn't from grandpa...is it?" "..."

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - L's Daily Life Extension Pack
childDownloads.description: This contains Oden Dagger, Red Thrusting Hell, Le Crusher, and The Maidinator.  "These seem like a part of Eugene's daily life, don't they..." "I heard he was hospitalized once, after he tried to get his wife to put on a maid costume..." "Why she didn't get rid of him years ago, I'll never know."

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Movie Gallery Open
childDownloads.description: This will unlock all of the movies for viewing.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - No Underestimated Pack
childDownloads.description: Contains Chickapede Alert, ManFist, Drying Typhoon, Paw Booties and Gaspode.  "Don't let your guard down just because their names sound kind of funny."

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Noble Person Pack
childDownloads.description: This contains Princess Bustier, Princess's Tiara, Imperial Guard, and Levitation Stone. "They don't seem very down-to-earth, do they..."

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Point Addition Pack 1
childDownloads.description: This contains 5000 G, 250 EP, 50 PP and 150 TP. They will bring you a little peace of mind.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Point Addition Pack 2
childDownloads.description: Contains 50,000 G, 5000 EP, 150 PP and 350 TP. This package gives you a little room to breathe.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Point Addition Pack 3
childDownloads.description: Contains 1,000,000 G, 500,000 EP, 750 PP, and 2500 TP. This package will make you feel generous all the time.  Perhaps it's time to let go of the stomach medicine you've been keeping in your pocket.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - Point Addition Pack 4
childDownloads.description: This package contains 50,000,000 G and 50,000,000 EP. It will fill you with a sense of superiority.

childDownloads.title: Agarest War Zero - PP Addition Pack 1
childDownloads.description: 5000 PP acquired! These are status points to be shared among your party members. It's up to you whether you want to share them equally, or spoil certain characters!
